Dec. 3, 1898 D Merthyr Contest (First Section)
Merthyr Contest (First Section) 110 Test Piece Contest South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association merthyr-contest-first-section
None
Herold [arr. Round]
Drill Hall, Merthyr Prizes: £15, £12, £7, £4 8th annual South Wales Association Contest. 4 bands competed.
Oct. 15, 2012, 7:12 p.m. June 3, 2020, 8:17 a.m.
